required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Atorvastatin and Pioglitazone on Carotid Atherosclerosis With the Use of Positron Emission Tomography-computed Tomography (PET-CT)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Effect of Atorvastatin and Pioglitazone in Carotid Atherosclerosis With the Use of 18Fluoride-Fludeoxyglucose(FDG) Positron Emission Tomography-computed Tomography (PET-CT)Imaging

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a prospective randomized clinical trial and to compare the antiinflammatory effect of atorvastatin single therapy and atorvastatin and pioglitazone combination therapy in carotid arteries of stable and unstable angina patients by PET/CT.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of Standardized Uptake Value (SUV) of Atherosclerotic Plaque in Carotid Artery by PET CT

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference PET CT Parameters in 3 Months Compared to Initial Evaluation
secondary_outcome.description: Change of Maximum Standardized Uptake Value (SUVmax),Mean Standardized Uptake Value (SUVmean)- no unit for this value

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of Laboratory Data Compared to Initial Evaluation
secondary_outcome.description: Change of high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP, mg/dl) Change of low density lipoprotein cholesterol(mg/dl) Change of high density lipoprotein cholesterol(mg/dl) Change of triglyceride (mg/dl) Change of matrix metalloproteinase 9 (mcg/ml) Change of plasminogen activator inhibitor (PAI)-1 (ng/ml) Change of Homeostatic Model Assessment (HOMA) index (%)
Major adverse cerebro-cardiovascular event: a composite of cardiac death, nonfatal myocardial infarction, stroke, and target vessel revascularization

arm_group.description: After the subject take PET CT, he or she is randomized to either " Atorvastatin 20 mg" group or " Atorvastatin 20 mg+ Pioglitazone 30 mg". The " Atorvastatin 20 mg" group is to take atorvastatin 20 mg and take follow up PET CT in 3 months

After the subject take PET CT, he or she is randomized to either " Atorvastatin 20 mg" group or " Atorvastatin 20 mg+ Pioglitazone 30 mg". The " Atorvastatin 20 mg + Pioglitazone 30 mg" group is to take atorvastatin 20 mg + pioglitazone 30 mg and take follow up PET CT in 3 months

intervention.description: atorvastatin 20 mg plus pioglitazone 30 mg QD for 3 months

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The subject who has undergone percutaneous coronary intervention due to coronary artery disease ( stable angina or unstable angina)
- The subject described above who has atherosclerotic plaque in his/her carotid artery by carotid ultrasonography
- The subject who or a legal representative agrees to the clinical trial and gives written permission to the IRB-approved form.
Exclusion Criteria:
- The subjets who have taken statins or thiazolidinedione with 4 weeks
- Marked elevated liver enzyme ( more than 2.5 fold compared to reference range)
- Renal insufficiency patients ( serum creatinine more than 2 mg/dl)
- Congestive heart failure ( NYHA class 2-4)
- Acue myocardial infarction
- Unstable angina with ST segment deviation
- Pregnancy
- The subjects enrolled in another studies

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Medicine, Seoul St. Mary's hospital, The Catholic University of Korea, Colege of Medicine

facility.name: Cardiovascular center, Seoul St. Mary's hospital

responsible_party.investigator_title: Cardiovascular Center, Seoul St. Mary's Hospital,

participant_flow.recruitment_details: The study was terminated prematurely due to slow enrollment.

group.title: Atorvastatin 20 mg
group.description: After the subject take PET CT, he or she is randomized to either " Atorvastatin 20 mg" group or " Atorvastatin 20 mg+ Pioglitazone 30 mg". The " Atorvastatin 20 mg" group is to take atorvastatin 20 mg and take follow up PET CT in 3 months Atorvastatin 20mg: 20 mg QD for 3 months

group.title: Atorvastatin 20 mg + Pioglitazone 30 mg
group.description: After the subject take PET CT, he or she is randomized to either " Atorvastatin 20 mg" group or " Atorvastatin 20 mg+ Pioglitazone 30 mg". The " Atorvastatin 20 mg + Pioglitazone 30 mg" group is to take atorvastatin 20 mg + pioglitazone 30 mg and take follow up PET CT in 3 months Atorvastatin 20 mg + Pioglitazone 30 mg: atorvastatin 20 mg plus pioglitazone 30 mg QD for 3 months

baseline.population: Four patients from each group withdrew the consent after enrollment.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
